2.headersubheading: Stay ahead with real-time safety performance and compliance updates

hero.tagline: Designed for complex projects, strict audits, and real-time site control
hero.title: Turn safety observations into clear, accountable actions.
hero.description: Axiomos unifies Observations, Work Permits, Toolbox Talks, Inductions, and Incident Reporting into one API-first platform. Create a single source of truth for site safety, enforce SLAs with escalation, and close every loop with clear ownership and audit-ready records.
pills: Risk rating engine aligned with your matrix
Safety audit, safety budget & KPI monitoring
40+ secure APIs for users, roles, projects & mobile apps

stats.label: Safety modules connected
stats.sub: Observations, Work Permits, TBT, Inductions, Incidents & more

stats.label: Typical closure SLA
stats.sub: Configurable alert timelines with multi-level escalation

stats.label: Uptime objective
stats.sub: Cloud-native, hardened for critical site operations

stats.label: Secure & extensible
stats.sub: Role-based access, full audit trails, and integrations

primaryFeatures.title: Observations that actually closes the loop
primaryFeatures.body: Log observations in seconds, assign clear owners, and auto-calculate due dates using your risk model (for example, alertTimeline × escalationAlert.length). The system surfaces what’s overdue, what’s at risk, and who needs to act next.

primaryFeatures.title: Work Permits without the paperwork
primaryFeatures.body: Digitise the full permit lifecycle with project-wise context. Link hazards and controls, capture signatures and photos, and keep a searchable archive that’s always ready for internal audits and client reviews.

primaryFeatures.title: Compliance, made visible
primaryFeatures.body: Unify Inductions, Toolbox Talks, and Incident Reports into a single, connected record. Supervisors and HSE heads get a clear view of compliance status by project, contractor, and assignee — in real time.

whyFeatures.title: Built for real projects
whyFeatures.body: Project-wise views, offline-friendly forms, and exportable records keep sites moving — even when connectivity is patchy.

whyFeatures.title: SLA & escalation engine
whyFeatures.body: Define alert timelines and escalation chains; the system computes due times (for example: 12h × 4 steps = 48h) and keeps everyone accountable.

whyFeatures.title: Governance & auditability
whyFeatures.body: Immutable logs, role-based access, and consistent data models across modules make audits and compliance reviews straightforward.

whyFeatures.title: Fast to deploy
whyFeatures.body: API-first design, minimal training, and simple integrations into your existing stack — so you see value in weeks, not months.

steps.label: Capture
steps.description: Log a Observations, Work Permit, incident, or meeting directly from site (mobile-friendly, photo & file uploads). Every record is time-stamped and linked to the right project, location, and contractor.

steps.label: Classify
steps.description: Tag each entry by risk level, category, activity, and area. Your risk matrix and checklists standardise how teams report issues across all projects.

steps.label: Assign
steps.description: Set clear owners, due dates, and priorities using your SLA and escalation rules. The system can suggest responsible engineers, supervisors, or contractors based on project and risk profile.

steps.label: Collaborate
steps.description: Owners add comments, upload photos, and record interim actions. HSE and project teams stay aligned in one thread instead of scattered WhatsApp chats and spreadsheets.

steps.label: Track
steps.description: Live dashboards highlight oldest open items, overdue actions, and high-risk observations by project, contractor, and assignee. Filters and exportable views keep reviews and audits structured.

steps.label: Close
steps.description: Capture corrective and preventive actions, attach evidence, and complete digital sign-offs. Closure is locked with a full audit trail for internal audits, client reports, and regulatory inspections.

steps.label: Learn & Improve
steps.description: Use trends, recurring hazards, and closure performance to refine training, toolbox talks, and controls. Management sees which teams respond quickly, and where additional support is needed.

security.title: Security & Compliance
items: Role-based access control with least-privilege defaults
Project, site, and contractor-level data segregation
Granular activity logs and exportable audit reports
Configurable approval workflows and digital sign-offs
IP, device and environment-ready for enterprise hardening

items.label: Q3
items.text: Bulk actions on Observations & permits, advanced Excel/PDF exports, SLA & escalation analytics dashboards

items.label: Q4
items.text: Mobile app enhancements (offline mode, background sync), custom risk matrices per client, multi-project heatmaps

items.label: Q4
items.text: First CCTV integration: camera registry, snapshot ingestion, and manual tagging of unsafe acts linked to Observations

items.label: H1
items.text: AI-assisted CCTV: automatic detection of PPE non-compliance and zone intrusions, auto-creating observations with evidence

items.label: H1
items.text: Deeper integrations: HRIS & payroll (for staff/labour mapping), SSO (OAuth/SAML), and webhook automations for alerts

items.label: H2
items.text: Cross-module analytics: incident trends, contractor scorecards, closure performance, and risk hot-spot mapping

items.label: H2
items.text: Configuration studio: no-code form fields, checklists, and workflows so HSE teams can adapt the system without code changes

items.label: Future
items.text: Computer-vision labour ID & attendance PoC, linking face recognition events to site access, inductions, and Observations history

items.label: Future
items.text: Automated client & regulatory packs: scheduled PDF/Excel exports for monthly safety reviews, audits, and board reporting

cta.title: Ready to simplify safety & compliance?
cta.description: Get a guided demo or start a pilot on one site — we will help you migrate in under a week and align it to your existing processes.
